Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: (yi) manisaharule kuna kurako barema sodhapucha garirakheka chan
(ke) tyasa thulo samacarako barema
jasama yiniharule matabheda garirakheka chan
hera, yiniharule sighra nai thaha pa'unechan
Ani yakinako satha yiniharule sighra nai thaha pa'unechan
Ke hamile dharatila'i ochyana bana'enaum
ra pahadaharula'i mekha khamba
ra hamile timila'i jodi–jodi srsti garyaum
Ra hamile timra nidrala'i aramako madhyama banayaum
Ra ratala'i parda banayaum
Ra dinala'i jivikoparjanako samaya banayaum
Ra timimathi hamile satavata sudrdha akasa nirmita garyaum
ra eka camkilo prakasamana surya banayaum
Ra badalaharubata hamile paniko brsti garayaum
Taki tyasabata anna ra sabji utpanna garaum
ra bakla ghana bagaincaharu
nihsandeha phaisalako dina niscita cha
juna dina surama phumkinecha, ani timiharu samuha–samuhama a'i upasthita hunechau
Ra akasa kholinecha, (tyasama) dhokaidhoka hunecha
Ra pahada cala'inechan, taba tiniharu reta (baluva) bha'ihalnechan
Nihsandeha jahannama ghatama cha
Arthat ullanghanakariharuko basasthana ho
Tyasama tiniharu varsaunvarsasam'ma rahanechan
Uniharu na tyasama sitalatako svada cakhnechan ra na kunai peyako
Umlirakheko pani ra bagirakheko pipa matra hunecha
Uniharule pura–pura pratiphala pa'unechan
Uniharula'i ta hisabako asa nai thi'ena
Ra nidara bha'era uniharule hamra ayataharuko upahasa gardathe
Hamile pratyeka kurala'i lekhera gantima rakheka chaum
Tasartha (aba) timile aphno karmako svada cakha. Hamile timimathi yatanako vrd'dhi gardai janechaum
Nihsandeha sanyamiharuko nimti thulo saphalata cha
Bagaicaharu chan, ra amguraharu chan
Nauyavana kumari yuvatiharu chin
Ra sarabaka (madiraka) tanatanna bhari'eka gilasaharu
Uniharule tyaham na ta kunai vyarthaka kura sunnechan, nata jhutha kuro sunne chan
Timro palanakartako tarphabata (uniharuko ramro) karmako pratiphala hunecha
usako tarphabata jo akasaharu ra prthviko ra tinako bicama je cha tyasako palanakarta ho. Ra dherai krpasila cha. Kasaila'i unisita kurakani garne adhikara chaina
Juna dina atma ra pharistaharu panktibad'dha bha'era ubhinechan tara kohi kuro garna sakdaina parantu jasala'i alalahale ajna dincha ra usale thika kuro mukhabata nikalnecha
Tyo dina satya (suniscita) cha. Aba jasale cahancha (satkarma garera) aphno palanakartakaham ramro thegana bana'os
Hamile timisita chitai a'unevala sajayabata darayaum. Junadina manche aphule gareko kama'i dekhnecha ra kaphira bhanne chan ki kasa hami mato bha'ihaleko bha'e
Dubera saktile tanneharuko kasama
Gamthola'i kholera chuta'idinevalaharuko kasama
Ra tairne phirne valaharuko saugandha
Pheri dagurera agadi hidne valaharuko saugandha
Pheri kama sampanna garna upaya garnevalaharuko saugandha
Juna dina kamnevali kamne china
Tyasako pachi–pachi pachadi a'unevali a'unechin
Dherai mutuharu tyasa dina dhukudhuka garnechan
Jasako drsti tala hunechan
Bhanchan ki ke hami pahileko avasthama pharka'ine chaum
Ke tyasabela jaba hami haddima parinata bha'isakne chaum
Bhandachana ki pheri yo pharkinu ta noksani dinevala cha
Thaha hunu parcha tyo ta matra e'uta daralagdo damta ho
Ki jasako prakata hunasathai tiniharu ekadamai maidanama ekatrita hunechan
Ke ‘‘musa(alaihis'salama)ko’’ sucana timila'i prapta bha'eko cha
jabaki unila'i unako palanakartale pavitra maidana ‘‘to'a’’ ma bolayo
Ki timi phira'aunako samaksa ja'u, tyasale atyacara garirakhekocha
Usala'i bhanaki ke timi surdhana cahanchau
ra yo ki ma tero palanakartako bato dekha'um ki timi daranegara
Tyasapachi unale usala'i thulo nisani dekha'e
Tara usale jhutho bhan'yo ra avajna garyo
Ani dagurdai pharkihalyo
Pheri sabala'i ekatrita garyo ra pukaryo
Ani bhan'yo timi sabaiko palanakarta ma nai hum
Taba(sababhanda ucca) allahale pani paraloka ra duniyamko sajayama usala'i samatihalyo
Jo allahasita dara mancha, usako nimti yasama patha cha
Timila'i srsti garnu dherai kathina kama ho ki akasala'i? Allahale(ta) usala'i banayo
Tyasako chatala'i ucca banayo, ani usala'i barabara (thika–thika) garidiyo
Ra tyasako ratila'i andhakaramaya banayo ra dinama prakata garyo
Ra yasa pascata dharatila'i samathara gari vistarita garidiyo
Yasabata pani ra cara umaryo
Ra tyasamathi pahadaharula'i majabutika satha sthapita garidiyo
Yi sabai timro ra timra caupayaharuko pha'idako nimti (chana)
Ani jaba tyo thulo vipada (kayamata) a'unecha
Junadina manisa aphule gareko kamala'i samjhanecha
Ra sabai dekhnevalaharuko samu narka kholidi'inecha
Ta jasale ateri garyo
Ra sansarika jivanala'i prathamikata diyo
Ta usako thegana narka hunecha
Ra jo aphno palanakartako samu ubhinubata daramanthyo ra aphno manala'i naramro icchabata rokeko thiyo
Ta tyasako basasthana jannata (svarga) nai ho
Manisaharule timisita kayamatako barema sodhchan ki tyo kahile a'umcha
Tyasako varnanasamga tapa'iko ke sambandha
tyo ghatita hune samayako janakari ta tapa'iko palanakartala'i nai cha
Jo vyakti usita dara mancha tapa'i ta usaila'i savadhana garnevalasam'ma hau
Jaba uniharule usala'i dekhnechan, taba yasto thannechan ki manaum sansarama eka samjha va eka bihanasam'ma matra baseka thi'e
Usale rukhapanagarera mukha pharkayo
Kinaki usako pasama e'uta andho ayo
Timila'i ke thaha sayada usako bhalo hune thiyo
Athava upadesa hasila gardathyo ra upadesabata usala'i pha'ida hunthyo
Tara jo laparavahi gardacha
Usaiko tarpha timi purai dhyana dinchau
Hunata yadi usale pavitrata prapta garena bhane timila'i kunai dosa a'umdaina
Ra jo timro pasama dagurdai ayo
Ra u (allahasita) darcha pani
Usala'i timile bevasta gardachau
Hera yo thika ho'ina kura'ana upadesako cija ho
Tasartha jasale cahos tyasabata upadesa prapta garos
Yo ta pavitra ucca panktiharuma ankita cha
Jo ucca tha'umma rakhi'eko ra pavitra cha
Yasta lekhnevalaharuko hatama (raheko) cha
Jo pratisthita ra pavitra chan
Allahako sajaya, manisa pani kati akrtajna cha
Allahale usala'i kuna kurabata srsti garyo
viryako e'uta thopabata srsti garyo, ani tyasala'i ramro andajama rakhyo
Ra usako nimti marga sarala bana'idiyo
Ani usala'i mrtyu pradana garyo ani kabrama (cihanama) pura'idiyo
Pheri jaba cahancha (cihanabata) ubhya'idinecha
kehi sandeha chaina ki allahale tyasala'i juna adesa diyo, tyasale usala'i purna garena
Ani manisale aphno bhojanala'i hernuparcha
Hamile nai dherai pani varsayaum
Pheri hamile nai dharatila'i (cirera) tukra–tukra paryaum
Tyasa pascata hamile nai tyasama anna ubjayaum
Ra angura ra tarakari
Ra jaituna ra khajuraharu
Ra bakla ghana bagaincaharu
Ra phala ra caraharu
(Yi sabai kura) timra prayoga ra pha'idako lagi ra timra caupayaharuko nimti banayaum
Tasartha jaba kanai cyatine (kiyamatako) pracanda avaja a'unecha
Tyasadina manisa aphna dajubha'iharubata
Ra aphno ama ra babubata
Ra aphno srimati ra choraharubata bhagnecha
Yimadhye pratyeka vyaktila'i tyasadina yasto cinta hunecha jo usaiko lagi paryapta hunecha
Kaiyan anuharaharu tyasadina talkiraheka hunechan
Hamsdai khusi ra anandita hunechan
Ra kaiyan anuharaharu tyasa dina dhuladhusarita hunechan
Jasamathi kalopana cha'eko hunecha
yi tinai kaphiracaritra duracari manisaharu hunechan
Jaba suryala'i berihalinecha
ra taraharule aphno camaka guma'unechan
Ra jaba pahadaharu cala'inechan
Ra jaba 10 mahine garbhavati umtaniharu bhaga'i halinechin
Ra jaba jangali janavaraharu ekatrita garinechana
Ra jaba samundraharu uttejita garinechan
Jaba atmaharu (sarirasamga) mila'inechan
Ra jaba ji'umdai gadi'eko ketisanga sodhinecha
Ki kuna papako karana usala'i mari'eko thiyo
Ra jaba karmapatra kholinechan
Ra jaba akasako chala ugharinecha
Ra jaba narkako ago prajjavalita garinecha
Ra jaba bahista (svarga) najika lya'inecha
Taba tyasadina hareka vyaktile thaha pa'ihalnecha ki usale ke li'era a'eko cha
Ma sapatha linchu ti taraharuko jo pachi hatihalchan
Ra jo ghumne ra hara'ihalne chan
Ra ratako kasama, jaba samapta hunathalcha
Ra pratahko kasama jaba udaya hunathalcha
Niscaya nai yo eka adaraniya sandesavahakale lya'eko vani ho
Jo saktivala cha, sinhasanako malikakaham jasako ucca darja cha
Jasako adesa akasaharuma man'ya huncha ra jo tyaham visvasaniya cha
Ra (makkabasiharu!) Timro sathi divana ho'inan
Unale yasa (pharista) la'i (akasako) khulla (purvi) ksitijama dekheka pani chan
Uni paroksako kura bata'una kanjusya'im pani gardainan
Ra yo kura'ana dusta saitanako kuro ho'ina
Pheri timi kata ga'iraheka chau
yo ta sampurna sansarako lagi margadarsana ho
Khasagari usako lagi jo timiharumadhye sojho batoma hindna cahos
Ra timile visvako palanakartale nacahikana kehi pani cahana sakdainau
Jaba akasa ksataviksata bha'ihalnecha
ra jaba taraharu jharihalnechan
Ra jaba samundra bagera janechan
Ra jaba cihanaharu utkhanita hunechan
Taba hara vyaktile thaha pa'unecha ki usale agadi ke patha'eko thiyo ra pachadi ke chodeko thiyo
he manava! Kuna kurale timila'i aphno udara palanakartako visayama bhramama pareko cha
(tyahi naho) jasale timila'i srsti garyo ra pheri (timra anga–pratyangaharula'i) thika–thika pari timila'i santulita banayo
Ra juna rupama cahyo, timila'i jodera tayara garyo
Kehi ho'ina, baru timile pratiphala di'ine dinala'i jhuthla'umchau
Jabaki timimathi nigarani garneharu niyukta chan
Pratisthita lekhneharu niyukta chan
Timile je gardachau, (tyasala'i) uniharu jandachan
Nihsandeha satkarmi manisaharu svargaka aiso arama ra anugrahama hunechan
Ra nihsandeha duracariharu narkama hunechan
(Arthat) pratiphalako dina tyasama pravesa garnechan
Ra tyasabata umkera jana sakne chainan
Ra timiharula'i ke thaha ki pratiphalako dina kasto cha
ma pheri bhanchu timila'i ke thaha ki pratiphalako dina kasto cha
Juna dina kunai vyakti kasaiko nimti kunai kurako adhikari hunechaina, ra sabai adesa tyasa dina allahakai hunechan
Napa ra taulama kami garneharula'i thulo kharabi cha
Jaba manisaharusita napera linchan, ta pura–pura linchan
Kintu jaba uniharula'i napera va taulera dinchan ta ghata'era dinchan
Ke yiniharula'i thaha chaina ki uniharu marepachi pakkai jivita pari utha'inechan
(Arthat) e'uta thulo dinama
Juna dina sabai manisaharu palanakartako samunne ubhinechan
nihsandeha duracariharuko kitaba (karmapatraharu) ‘‘sijjinama’’ cha
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki sijjina ke ho
yo ta lekhi'eko panjjika ho
Tyasa dina jhutha thahara'uneharula'i thulo kharabi (dhikkara) cha
Jasale nisaphako dinala'i asatya bhandathe
Ra tyasala'i jhutho uniharule matra thahara'umchan, jo sima'atikramana garnevala aparadhi chan
Jaba usala'i hamra ayataharu suna'incha ta bhandacha ki yo ta pahilaka manisaharuka kathaharu hun
Yo ho'ina, apitu jasale naramro karmaharu gardachan, tyasakarana unaka hrdayaharuma khiya lagisakeko huncha
Nihsandeha yiniharu tyasa dina aphno palanakartako darsanabata vancita hunchan
Pheri nihsandeha yiniharu narkama pravesa garnechan
Tyasapachi (unisita) bhaninecha ki yo tyahi kura ho, jasala'i timiharule asatya thahara'unthyau
Nihsandeha sunirakha ki satkarmiharuko karmapatra ‘‘illiyinama’’ chan
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki illiyina ke ho
tyo ta lekhi'eko kitaba ho
Samipyaprapta pharistaharu tyasako niriksana gardachan
Nihsandeha bhaladamiharu thulo anugrahama hunechan
Palangaharumathi herirakheka masahariharubata hernechan
Uniharuko anuharabatai timila'i ti anugrahaharuko tajagi ra abhako bodha bha'irahanecha
Uniharula'i silabandi visud'dha peya pila'inecha
Jasako sila kasturi ko hunecha. Tasartha anukampa cahanele usaila'i prapta garnuma pratispardha garnuparcha
Ra yasama tasanima (svargako e'uta chahara) ko pani milavata hunecha
Tyo e'uta jharana ho jasako pani khasa khasa manisaharule pi'unechan
Kaphiraharule sansarama mominaharuko hamso garne gardathe
Ra unako pasabata avata javatagarda ta amkhabata sanketa gardathe
Ra jaba aphno gharatira pharkanthe ta thatta garne gardathe
Ra jaba ti (mominaharula'i) dekhdathe ta bhandathe ki yiniharu pakkai margavicalita chan
jabaki uniharula'i yiniharumathi niriksaka bana'era patha'i'eko thi'ena
Tasartha aja mominaharule ti kaphiraharumathi hamso garnechan
Masanadaharumathi (basi uniharuko avastha) dekhirakheka hunechan
Atah kaphiraharula'i uniharuka karmaharuko (pura–pura) pratiphala prapta bha'ihalyo
Jaba akasa chiya–chiya parihalnecha
Ra aphno palanakartako adesako palana garnecha ra usala'i pani yahi cahiyo
Ra jaba dharatila'i samatala paridi'inecha
Ra je–jati tyasama cha, tyasala'i bahira phyamkidinecha ra (bilkulai) ritto bha'ihalnecha
Ra aphno palakartako adesa palana garnecha. Ra usala'i ucita pani yahi cha
He manisa! Timi aphno palanakartasita bhetdasam'ma prayasa ra aneka kama garera usita bheta garnevala chau
Ani juna sukaila'i usako karmapatra usako dahine hatama di'inecha
Ta usita saralatako satha hisaba li'inecha
Ra tyo aphno aphantaharutira khusi bha'era pharkanecha
Ra tyo vyakti jasako karmapatra usako pithyumko pachadibata di'inecha
Ta tyasale mrtyula'i pukarne cha
Ra prajvalita narkama (dojakhama) pravesa garnecha
Tyo manisa aphno aphantaka manisaharuma magna rahanthyo
Ra thani rakhthyo ki allahatira pharkera janechaina
Ho, kina ho'ina? Yadyapi usako palanakartale usala'i herirakheko thiyo
Mala'i kasama cha dubne belako prakasako
Ra ratriko kasama ra usadvara ekatrita gari'eka vastuharuko kasama
Ra candrako, jabaki tyo purna bha'ihalcha
Ki timile niscaya nai eka avasthabata arko avasthasam'ma pugnechau
Ta uniharula'i ke bha'eko cha ki imana lya'umdainan
Ra jaba uniharuko agadi kura'ana padhincha ta dhoga (sijda) gardainan
Baru kaphiraharule jhuthla'umchan
Yiniharule aphno hrdayama juna kura luka'umchan, tyasala'i allaha ramrari jandacha
Tasartha uniharula'i kastadayaka yatanako samacara suna'idinu
Ho, imanavalaharu ra asala karma garneharuko nimti asimita ra nasakine puraskara cha
Akasako kasama, jasama taramandala cha
Ra tyasa dinako kasama jasako vaca cha
Upasthita hunevala ra upasthita gara'i'ekaharuko kasama
Ki khalto (khanneharu) nasta gari'e
Tyo e'uta ago thiyo (khaltoharu) jasama indhana (hali'eko thiyo)
Jabaki uniharu tyasaka varipari baseka thi'e
Ra muslimaharusamga je garnegareka thi'e tyo aphno samu dekhiraheka thi'e
Yiniharule ti mominaharusamga (kunai an'ya aparadhako) badala li'iraheka thi'enan, matra yasako lagi ki uniharu allahamathi imana rakhdathe jo atyanta adhipatyasali ra prasansaniya cha
Jasako nimti akasaharu ra prthviharuko satta cha ra allahako samu hareka vastu cha
Nihsandeha ja–jasale imanavala purusa ra imanavali striharula'i duhkha di'e, ani prayascita garenan, ta uniharuko nimti narkako yatana hunecha ra poline yatana cha
Nihsandeha jasale imana lya'e ra asala karma garirahe uniharuko nimti bagaincaharu chan jasamuni naharaharu bagirakheka chan, yahi nai thulo saphalata ho
Nihsandeha timro palanakartako pakada atyanta kathora cha
Usaile pahilo pataka srsti gardacha ra usaile dosro pataka (jivita) garnecha
Ra tyo thulo muktidata ra atyanta prema garnevala cha
Sinhasanako svami, bado gauravasali cha
Je cahancha garihalcha
Ke timila'i ti senaharuko pani samacara pugeko cha
(Arthat) phira'auna ra samudako
Kehi ho'ina, kaphiraharu ta (jani jani) asatya kura thahra'unuma lagi rahekachan
Ra allahale pani uniharula'i sabaitirabata gherama halisakeko cha
Baru yo kura'ana dherai gauravasali cha
Lauhe mahaphuja (suraksita phalama pattika) ma ankita (cha)
Kasama cha akasa ra ratima prakasita hunevalako
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki ratima prakata hunevala ke ho
tyo tara ho, camkilo
Kunai vyakti yasto chaina jasamathi e'uta pharista niriksaka niyukta nahos
Manusyala'i avasyaka cha ki dekhos ki u kuna kurobata srsti gari'eko cha
Tyo e'uta ucali'eko panibata janmeko cha
Jo pithyum ra chatiko bicabata niskancha
Niscaya nai u usala'i pharka'idine (arthat punah jivita paridine) kuroma samathryavana cha
Juna dina (manama) luka'i'eka kuraharu jamcinechan
Ta tyasabela manisako sathama na ta tyasako sakti hunecha ra na kohi sahayaka
Akasako kasama jasale vrsti gardacha
Ra dharatiko kasama juna cyatinevala cha
Ki yo vani ‘‘kura'ana’’ satika phaisala garnevala vani ho
Tyo kunai thatta ho'ina
Uniharu e'uta sadyantra garirakheka chan
Ra maile pani e'uta calacali rakheko chu
Atah timile kaphiraharula'i mohalata di'ihala, kehi dina unala'i chadidinu
(He paigambara!) Aphno sarvocca palanakartako namako gunagana garnu
Jasale (manisala'i) srsti garyo ani (tyasaka angaharula'i) thika (krama ra samanupatama) milayo
Ra jasale thika thaka nirdharita garyo, ani marga dekhayo
Ra jasale vanaspati umaryo
Ani tyasala'i suka'era kalo rangaka thutaharu bana'idiyo
Hamile timila'i padha'idinechaum, ani timile birsane chainau
Tara juna allahale cahancha, u pratyaksa ra paroksala'i jandacha
Hamile tapa'iko lagi sajilo garidinechaum
Atah tapa'ile upadesa gardai garnus, yadi upadesa labhaprada cha
Tyasale upadesa prapta garihalcha, jasala'i bhaya hunecha
Ho, durbhagyavala tyasabata panchinecha
Jo thulo agoma parnecha
Ani tyasama na marnecha ra na bamcnecha
Nihsandeha tyo saphala bha'ihalyo jasale aphula'i sud'dha paryo
Ra aphno palanakartako namako smarana garyo ra namaja padhne garyo
Tara timiharule ta sansarika bhautika jivanala'i prathamikata dinchau
Jaba ki akhirata dherai uttama ra sesa rahanevala cha
Nihsandeha yahi kura pahilaka kitabaharuma pani cha
Arthata ‘‘ibrahima’’ ra ‘‘musaka’’ kitabaharuma
Ke timila'i pani tyasa gherihalne kiyamatako samacara pugeko cha
tyasa dina dherai anuharaharu apamanita hunechan
Kathina parisramama pareka, thaki'eka hunechan
Uni dhapadhapi baleko agoma pravesa garnechan
Uniharula'i umlirakheko srotako tato pani pila'inecha
Uniharuko lagi kamdavala rukha baheka aru kehi khanekura hunechaina
Jasale na moto garnecha na bhoka meta'unecha
Tyasadina kaiyan anuharaharu praphullita ra santusta hunechan
Aphno prayasama prasanna
Ucca ra sanadara svargama hunechan
Jasama kunai vyarthakura sunne chainan
Tyasama jharanaharu pravahita hunechan
Ra agla–agla palangaharu hunechan
Pyalaharu ramrari saja'i'era rakhi'eka hunechan
Ra kramaisita masanadaharu saja'i'eka hunechan
Ra makhamali occhyanaharu ochya'i'eka hunechan
Ke uniharule umtatira dekhdainan ki tiniharu kuna tarikale paida gari'eka chan
Ra akasatira ke kasto ucca gari'ekocha
ra pahadatira ke kuna prakarale khada gari'ekocha
ra dharatitira ki kasari bicha'i'eko cha
tasartha tapa'ile upadesa garne garnus kinaki tapa'i matra upadesa garnevala hau
Tapa'i uniharumathi sanraksaka ho'inau
Ho, jo vimukha huncha ra kuphra garcha
Ta allahale tyasala'i thulo sajaya dine cha
nihsandeha uniharula'i hamro pasama pharkera a'unuparnecha
Ani hamile nai unako hisaba linechaum
Phajra (usakala) ko kasama
Ra dasa rataharuko kasama
Ra joda ra bijoda (sama–visama) ko kasama
Ra ratako kasama, jaba yo jana thalcha
Ke yi kuraharuko kasama bud'dhimaniharuko lagi paryapta chan
Ke tapa'ile dekhnu bha'ena ki tapa'iko palanakartale adaharusamga ke garyo
stambhajasta ‘‘irama’’ lamo kadavalako satha
Yi sampurna srstima yiniharuko sadrsa kunai samudaya paida gari'eko thi'en
Ra samudaharusamga (ke garyo) jo besima thula thula dhunga katdathe
Ra phira'aunasamga jasale mekhaharu rakhdathyo
yiniharu sabaile desaharuma ateripana garirakheka thi'e
Ra yaham dherai utpataharu maca'irakheka thi'e
Antatah timro palanakartale uniharumathi yatanako korra barsayo
Nihsandeha timro palanakarta heri ghatamacha

Tara manisako avastha yo cha ki jaba usako rabale (palanakartale) usako pariksa gardacha ra usala'i pratistha ra anugraha pradana gardacha taba tyasale bhandacha ki mero palanakartale mala'i pratisthita garyo
Ra jaba usale usako pariksa yasaprakara gardacha ki usako jivika sankucita garidincha. Taba usale bhandacha ki mero rabale mala'i apamanita garyo
Yasto kadapi ho'ina, baru timiharule nai anathako sam'mana gardainau
Ra na garibala'i khuva'unako lagi eka–arkala'i protsahana gardachau
Ra mrtakako sara mala sameti kha'idinchau
Ra dhanasita atyanta prema gardachau
Tasartha dharatila'i jaba phutalera curna curna gari eka samana garinecha
Ra tero palanakarta svayam a'une cha ra pharistaharu eka–eka gari panktibad'dha bha'i a'unechan
Ra narkala'i tyasadina upasthita gara'inecha, tyasadina manisale cetnecha, tara tyasa dina cetebata kehi pha'ida hunechaina
Usale bhannecha, kasa maile aphno (yasa) jindagiko nimti kehi agadi patha'eko bha'e
Ani tyasadina allahako sajaya jasto yatana kasaiko hunechaina
Ra kohi chaina jasale usako jasto jakadi'era bamdhna sakos
Ra he santusta atma
Aphno palanakartatira timi yasa kisimale pharka ki timi usita prasanna ra u timisita prasanna
Atah mera khasa dasaharuma sam'milita bha'ihala
Ra pravesa gara mero svargama
Hamila'i yasa nagara (makka) ko kasama
Ra tapa'i yasai nagarama ta basnu huncha
Ra manaviya babu ra usako santatiko kasama
Nihsandeha hamile manisala'i dherai duhkhama paida gareka chaum
Ke usale yo thandacha ki usamathi kasaiko niyantrana chaina
Bhandacha ki maile dherai mala sampatti kharca garidi'em
Ke usala'i yo lagdacha ki kasaile usala'i dekhena
Ke hamile usala'i du'ita amkha di'enaum
Ra jibro ra du'ita otha (di'enaum)
ra usala'i duvai marga pani dekhayaum
Ta usale tyo ghatima pasna sakena
ra timila'i ke thaha ki tyo ghati ke ho
(kasaiko) garadanala'i (dasatvabata) mukti dila'unu
Va bhokako dina khana khuva'unu
Kunai natedara anathala'i
va dhuladhusarita (phakira) bhiksula'i
Ani ti manisaharuma sam'milita huna sakthyau jasale imana lya'umchan ra eka arkala'i dhairya rakhna ra daya garnuko nimti siksa dinchan
Yi manisaharu nai dayam hatavala hun
Ra jasale hamra ayataharula'i manenan uniharu bayam hatavala hun
Yiniharumathi nai ago hunecha jo caraitirabata ghereko hunecha
Suryako kasama ra tyasako tapako
Ra candrako kasama, jaba tyasako pachadi uda'umcha
Ra dinako kasama jaba suryala'i prakata garidincha
Ra ratiko kasama jaba usala'i luka'umcha
Akasa ra tyasala'i bana'uneko kasama
Kasama cha dharatiko, ra tyasala'i samathara bana'uneko
Kasama cha indriyaharuko ra tinala'i durusta bana'une (kama) ko
Pheri samajha diyo usala'i vyabhicara ra tyasabata bamcera alaga rahanuko
Jasale (tyasa) indriyala'i sud'dha rakhyo, tyo saphala bhayo
Ra jasale tyasala'i matoma milayo, tyo asaphala bhayo
Samudale aphno ateripanako karanale (sandestala'i) jhuthlayo
Jaba uniharumadhyebata sabaibhanda durbhagyasali ubhiyo
(Taba) allahako rasulale usala'i bhane, ‘‘savadhana allahako umtani ra usale pi'une paloko raksa gara’’

Tara uniharule aphna paigambarala'i asatya samjhera tyasa umtniko kurkuccako nasa katidi'e, taba allahale uniharuka papako karanale uniharumathi barbadi pathayo ra pheri sabaila'i nasta gari tyasa bastila'i barabara garidiyo
Usala'i tyasako vinasakari parinamako kunai bhaya chaina
Ratriko kasama, jaba dhakcha
Ra dinako kasama, jaba ki camkincha
Ra tyasa hastiko kasama, jasale purusa ra striko srsti garyo
Nihsandeha timro prayasa bhinna–bhinna cha
Tasartha jasale (allahako margama dhanamala) diyo ra dara man'yo (aphno palanakartako)
Ra ramro kurako pusti gardaigaryo
Ta hamile pani usala'i sajilo batoko suvidha pradana garnechaum
Tara jasale kanjusi garyo ra jo laparavahi dekhayo
Ra asala kurako upahasa garyo
Ta hamile pani usala'i abhava ra kathina'ika samagri pradana garnechaum
Tyasako dhanamala, u khaldoma ladda usako kunai pani kama a'une chaina
Niscaya nai hamro jim'ma ta marga dekha'unu cha
Ra vastavama hamrai adhikarama cha paraloka ra sansara
Maile ta timila'i prajvalita agobata savadhana gara'idi'em
Jasama matra tyahi parnecha jo sahrai nai abhaga hunecha
Jasale jhuthlayo ra (usako anusaranabata) mukha pharkayo
Ra jo bado sanyami hunecha, tyasala'i tyasabata tada rakhinecha
Jasale aphno sampatti di'era aphula'i sud'dha bana'umdacha
Ra (yasakarana) dindaina ki usamathi kasaiko upakara cha. Jasako sattama kunai kisimako badalako asa gari'eko huncha
Baru matra usako aphno mahana palanakartako anuharako (darsanako) lagi (arthata rabako prasannata pa'unako lagi)
Nihsandeha tyo (allaha) sighra nai raji bhaihalnecha
Suryako mathi bha'ihalane samaya (casta) ko saugandha
Ra kasama cha, ratri ko jaba cha'umcha
Timro palanakartale na ta timila'i chadeko cha ra na udasina bha'eko cha
Niscitarupale timro nimti pahilobhanda parinama ramro hunecha
Timro palanakartale sighra nai timila'i (puraskara) pradana garnecha ta timi prasanna bha'ihalnechau
Ke usale timila'i anatha pa'era sarana di'ena
ra timila'i margavicalita dekhera sahi bato dekha'ena
Ra timila'i kamajora pa'era baliyo bana'ena
Tasartha timile pani anathamathi atyacara nagarnu
Ra mamgnevalala'i hapka'une nagarnu
Ra aphno palanakartako anukampala'i varnana gardaigarnu
Ke hamile timro chati kholidi'enaum
ra timimathibata timro bojha pani hamile utaridiyaum
Jasale timro kam'mara bhamcirakheko thiyo
Ra hamile timro maryada ucca paryaum
Nihsandeha kathina'iko sathama saralata pani cha
Nihsandeha kastako satha sajilo (saralata) cha
Jaba timila'i phursada huncha, taba ibadata (puja)ma parisrama gara
ra aphno palanakartatirai pravrtta bha'ihalne gara
Injirako kasama ra jaitunako
Ra ture sininako
Ra yasa santipurna saharako (makkako) kasama
Hamile nihsandeha manusyala'i sarvottama akarama banayaum
Pheri nikrstatama dasatira pharkayaum
Tara ti manisaharu jasale imana lya'e ra jasale asala karma gare, uniharuko lagi kahilyai samapta nahune pratiphala cha
Ani (he adamako santati!) Timile pratiphalako dinala'i asatya thahara'umna kuna kurale utprerita gardacha
Ke allaha sabai hakimaharubhanda thulo hakima ho'ina
aphno palanakartako nama li'era padha, jasale srsti garyo
Jasale manisala'i ragatako thopabata banayo
Timi padhdai gara timro palanakarta bado dayavana cha
Jasale kalamako madhyamabata siksa pradana garyo
Jasale manisala'i tyo jnana pradana garyo, juna usale jandainathyo
Tara manisa ullanghanakari bha'ihaldacha
Yasakarana ki usale aphula'i atmanirbhara dekhdacha
Yasama kunai sandeha chaina ki timro palanakartatira nai pharkijanu parnecha
Ke timile tyasa vyaktila'i dekhyau? Jasale (allahako) sevakala'i manahi gardacha
(Arthat) eka allahako bhaktala'i jabaki usale namaja padhnathalcha
Timro ke vicara cha? Yadi tyo sojho margama cha bhane
Va sanyamita rahanuko adesa dincha bhane
Accha hera ta yadi tyasa (roknevala)le jhutha than'yo ra mukha pharka'eko bha'e
ta ke usale janena, ki allahale ramrari usala'i dekhirahekocha
Nihsandeha yadi tyasale manena bhane hamile usala'i usako ta'ukoko (nidharako) kapala samatera ghisarne chaum
Yasto ta'uko jo jhutho aparadhi cha
Yiniharu aphna sathiharuko parisadla'i bola'un
Hamile pani aphno sajayaka dutaharula'i bola'unechaum
Khabaradara! Usako bhana'i kadapi namannu ra sajada garnu ra (allahako) nikatata prapta gardairahun
Hamile yasa (kura'ana) la'i kadrrako ratama avatarita garyaum
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki sabekadra (gauravako ratri) ke ho
sabekadra eka hajara mahinabhanda ramro cha
Yasama ruhula amina (jibra'ila) ra pharistaharu pratyeka kama sampanna garnako lagi, aphno palanakartako adesabata avatarita hunchan
Yo rata purnataya santi ra bhala'iko ho, usakalako udaya hunesam'ma
Ahale kitaba ra musrikaharu kuphrabata alaga hunevala chainan jabasam'ma ki unako pasama spasta pramana a'umdaina
Allahako tarphabata e'uta rasula jo pavitra prsthaharula'i padhosa
Jasama asala ra thika adesaharu ankita chan
Ra kitabavalaharu aphu samaksa spasta pramana a'isakepachi vibhajita bha'eka chan

Uniharula'i yahi matra adesa di'i'eko thiyo ki nisthapurvaka allahako upasana garun ra ekagra bha'era usaiko lagi dharmala'i sud'dha rakhuna. Ra nisthako satha namaja padhun ra jakata de'un ra yahi nai sabaiko samco dharma ho
Kitabavalaharumadhyebata jo kaphira chan ra musrikaharu sabai narkako agoma (parnechan ra) tiniharu sadhaim tyasama rahanechan. Yi manisaharu sabai pranibhanda naramra hun
Ra jasale imana lya'e ra asala karma garirahe, tiniharu sampurna praniharuma ramra hun

Uniharuko badala uniharuko palanakartakaham sadhaim basa garne bagaincaharu hun, jasamuni naharaharu bagirakheka hunechan. Sadhaim sadhaim tiniharuma rahanechan. Allaha uniharusita khusi bhayo ra uniharu usasita khusi bha'e, yo pratiphala usako nimti ho, jo aphno palanakartasita dara mancha
Jaba dharati purnarupale (bhukampabata) prakampita gara'ihalinecha
Ra prthvile aphno (bhitrako) bojha bahira nikalidinecha
Manisale bhanna thalcha ki yasala'i ke bha'eko cha
tyasadina prthvile aphno sabai kuraharu varnana garnecha
Yasakarana ki timro palanakartale usala'i adesa patha'eko hunecha
Tyasadina manisaharu samuha–samuha gari phirta a'unechan taki unila'i unako karmapatri dekha'idi'iyos
Atah jasale alikati pani neki(punya) gareko hunecha, usale tyasala'i dekhihalnecha
Ra jasale alikati pani naramro kama gareko hunecha, usale tyasala'i dekhihalnecha
Ti ghod'aharuko kasama jo tivra gatile haphdai dagurchan
Ani dhungama nalako thakkarabata jhilkaharu nikalnevalaharuko kasama
Ani pratahko samaya dhava bolneharuko kasama
Ani jo tyasa samayama dhulakanaharu uda'umdachan
Ani tyasabakhata senaharubhitra pasi dinchan
Nihsandeha manisa aphno palanakartako bado akrtajna cha
Ra niscaya nai u svayam pani yasa upara saksi cha
Tyo dhanako mohama bado drdha cha
Ke tyasale tyasa samayala'i jandaina jaba cihanama je chan, uniharu bahira nikalinechan
Ra juna (rahasya) hrdayaharuma chan, ti prakata garinechan
Nihsandeha unako palanakartale tyasadina unako avasthasamga ramrari paricita hunecha
(Tyo) khadakhada'une carko svara garnevala
Khadakhada'une ke ho
ra timila'i ke thaha ki tyo khadakhada'i dine ke ho
juna dina manisaharu yasta hunchan jasto ki chari'eka bhusunaharu
Ra pahadaharu dhuni'eka runga virangaka una, jasta hunechan
Pheri jasaka (karmaharuko) vajana garungo hunecha
u ta icchita aramako jindagima hunechan
Ra jasako vajana halaka hunechan
uniharuko pharkera jane tha'um ‘‘haviya’’ (gahiro khaldo) ho
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki ‘‘haviya’’ ke ho
(tyo) prajvalita ago ho
Timila'i dheraiko (sampattiko) icchale asavadhana garidi'eko cha
Yahamsam'maki timi kabrastana pugihalyau
Ho'ina, timila'i atyanta chitai thaha bha'ihalnecha
Pheri kehi chaina, timila'i sighra nai thaha bha'ihalcha
Ho'ina timi yakinako satha thaha pa'umchau
Ta timile avasya nai narka dekhnechau
Ani timile yasala'i visvasako amkhale dekhnechau
Ani niscaya nai tyasa dina timisita (allahaka) anukampaharuko barema sodhapucha hunecha
Samaya (yuga) ko kasama
Vastavama manisaharu purai ghatama chan
Ti manisaharu baheka, jasale imana lya'e ra asala karma garirahe ra (jasale) apasama satya kurako agraha ra eka arkala'i dhairyako takeda garirahe
Barbadi cha, tyasto pratyeka manisako jo arkako avaguna khojne gardacha ra cukuli garirahancha
Jasale malasampatti thupardai jancha ra tyasala'i gandai rakhcha
Usale thancha ki usako sampatti usasamga sadhaim rahanecha
Kadapi ho'ina, yo ta avasya tukra–tukra paridine agoma phyamkinecha
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki yasto (ago) hutma ke ho
tyo allahadvara prajvalita ago ho
Jo chatimathi cadhdai janecha
Ra (tyo ago) unimathi,sabai disabata banda huncha
Thulathula stambhaharuma
Ke timile dekhenau ki timro palanakartale hativalaharusamga ke garyo
ke usale uniharuko duscakrala'i vyartha bana'idi'ena
ra uniharumathi samuhaka samuha panksiharu patha'idiyo
Jo uniharula'i mato ra pat'tharako dallale haniraheka thi'e
Jasale uniharula'i capa'iko bhusa jasto bana'idi'e
Kuraisala'i paricita garnuko lagi
Uniharula'i jado ra garmiko samayama yatrasamga paricita gara'unako lagi
Atah uniharula'i avasyaka cha ki yasai gharako rabako puja garun
Atah jasale uniharula'i bhokama khana khuvayo ra dara ra bhayabata amana caina pradana garyo
Timile tyasala'i dekhyau, jasale pratiphala (ko dinala'i) jhutha thahara'umdacha
Uhi ta ho jasale anathaharula'i dhakka dincha
Ra nimukhaharula'i khva'une kurama protsahita gardaina
Atah aphasoca cha ti namajiharula'i (ra vaila namaka narkako tha'um) cha
Jo aphno namajaprati asavadhana chan
Jasale adambaraka kama gardachan
Ra garnuparne kuraharubata rokchan
Nihsandeha hamile timila'i ‘‘hauje kausara’’ (anukampaharu) pradana gareka chaum
Atah aphno palanakartako lagi namaja padhne gara ra usako nimti kurbani gara
Nihsandeha timro satru nai lavarisa nama–nisana begarako hunecha
(He muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama!) Bhanidinus ki he kaphiraharu
junala'i timile pujdachau, uniharuko ma puja gardinam
Ra jasako upasana ma gardachu, usako timile upasana gardainau
Ra jasala'i timile pujdachau, tiniharuko ma puja garnevala chaina
Ra na timi usako upasana garnevala chau, jasako ki ma upasana gardachu
Timro nimti timro dharma cha ra mero nimti mero dharma
Jaba allahako sahayata ra vijaya prapta bha'ihalos
Ra timile manisaharuko samuhamathi samuha allahako dina (dharma) ma pravesa garirakheko dekhihalchau
Taba aphno palanakartako prasansaka satha gunagana gara ra usita ksamayacana gara. Niscaya nai u ksamayacana svikara garnevala cha
Abu lahabaka duvaihata bhamci'e ra tyo svayam pani nasta bha'ihalyo
Nata usako sampatti usako kama ayo ra na usako kama'i
U sighra nai prajvalita agoma parnecha
Ra usaki stri pani janeche juna da'ura boknevali che
Usako ghamtima khajurabata bana'i'eko dori hunecha
Tapa'i bhanidinus ki tyo allaha eka cha
Allaha nirapeksa cha
Nata usabata kohi janmeko cha, na u kasaibata janmeko cha
Ra na kohi usako samakaksa cha
Tapa'i bhannus ki ma pratahko svamiko sarana magdachu
Hareka kuroko naramro karyabata, juna usale srsti gareko cha
Ra amdhyaro ratiko andhakarabata, jabaki tyasako amdhyarole dhamkihalcha
Ra gamthoma phumka marneharu (jadu) ko naramro karyabata
Ra isryaluko naramro karyabata pani jabaki tyasale isrya gardacha
Tapa'i bhanidinus ki ma manisaharuko palanakartako sarana mamgdachu
Manisaharuko svamiko
Ra manisaharuko upasyako (sarana)
Kharaba vicara halne ra (uksa'era) pachi hati janebata
Jasale manisaharuko hrdayama naramro karmako sanckara haldacha
Tyo cahe jinnaharumadhyebata hos va manisaharumadhyebata
